page.title: 13A Working day in Dale
page.content: My name is Wayne Richards.I am 10 years old.We get up soon after 7a.m., and have breakfast.My dad has to be at his work on a nearby farm at 8o'clock. He drives a tractor and looks after the cattle and sheep.My brother and I go to school on the bus.We have to work at our lessons.My mother and little brother stay at home.My mother does the housework.She washes the clothes and irons them.She cleans the house and hoovers the carpets.She sometimes takes my little brother to the playgroup where he learns to play with other children.We come home at 4 o'clock and my mum makes the tea while we do homework and then watch T.V.My dad comes home for his tea,and then he has a sleep after his tiring work. After that he has a bath and watches T.V.
